plot: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson must solve a cryptic puzzle that will lead them to the insidious Professor Moriarty, who plans to sell a new secret armament device to the enemies of the British Empire.
title: Sherlock Holmes and Moriarty's Secret Weapon
plot_es: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson must solve a cryptic puzzle that will lead them to the insidious Professor Moriarty, who plans to sell a new secret armament device to the enemies of the British Empire.
original_name: Sherlock Holmes and Moriarty's Secret Weapon
